synopsis: In the future, with the increasing number of natural disasters and disasters from the universe, a mysterious organization called "Shanhai Jihui" appeared, intending to destroy and replace contemporary human beings. The protagonist, Lei Qi, joins the "Titanium" exoskeleton armored combat team, and has a multi-faceted confrontation with this mysterious technological organization. Through step-by-step decryption, he discovered that the human dream is actually a window to fully access the entire universe, so he revolved around the reality and the quadrant. The exploration of the world and the confrontation between civilizations of different ages began...
